trans-unit.source: Data provenance: Automatically track inputs, outputs & metadata of all calculations in a provenance graph for full reproducibility. Perform fast queries on graphs containing millions of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 数据来源：在来源图中自动跟踪所有计算的输入，输出和元数据，以实现完全可重复性。对包含数百万个节点的图执行快速查询。

trans-unit.source: HPC interface: Move your calculations to a different computer by changing one line of code. AiiDA is compatible with schedulers like SLURM, PBS Pro, torque, SGE or LSF out of the box.
trans-unit.target: HPC界面：通过更改一行代码，将计算结果移动到另一台计算机上。AiiDA与SLURM，PBS Pro， torque， SGE或 LSF等调度程序兼容 。

trans-unit.source: Open Science: Export subsets of your provenance graph and share them with peers or make them available online for everyone on the Materials Cloud.
trans-unit.target: 开放式科学：导出出处图的子集并与同行共享，或者使它们可供材料云上的所有人在线使用。

trans-unit.source: Open source: AiiDA is released under the MIT open source license
trans-unit.target: 开源： AiiDA是根据MIT开源许可证发布的

trans-unit.source: Plugin interface: Extend AiiDA with plugins for new simulation codes (input generation & parsing), data types, schedulers, transport modes and more.
trans-unit.target: 插件接口：使用新的仿真代码（输入生成和解析），数据类型，调度程序，传输模式等扩展插件来扩展AiiDA 。

trans-unit.source: Workflows: Write complex, auto-documenting workflows in python, linked to arbitrary executables on local and remote computers. The event-based workflow engine supports tens of thousands of processes per hour with full checkpointing.
trans-unit.target: 工作流：用python编写复杂的自动文档化工作流，并链接到本地​​和远程计算机上的任意可执行文件。基于事件的工作流引擎每小时通过完全检查点支持数以万计的进程。

trans-unit.source: Acknowledgements
trans-unit.target: 鸣谢

trans-unit.source: Activity
trans-unit.target: 活动

trans-unit.source: AiiDA (www.aiida.net) is a workflow manager for computational science with a strong focus on provenance, performance and extensibility.
trans-unit.target: AiiDA（www.aiida.net）是计算科学的工作流管理器，非常注重源，性能和可扩展性。

trans-unit.source: AiiDA is a NumFOCUS Affiliated Project and supported by the MARVEL National Centre of Competence in Research, the MaX European Centre of Excellence and by a number of other supporting projects, partners and institutions, whose complete list is available on the AiiDA website acknowledgements page.
trans-unit.target: AiiDA是NumFOCUS的一个附属项目，由MARVEL国家研究能力中心，MaX欧洲卓越中心以及许多其他支持项目，合作伙伴和机构提供支持，其完整列表可在AiiDA网站的致谢页面上找到。

trans-unit.source: AiiDA is a workflow manager for computational science with a strong focus on provenance, performance and extensibility.
trans-unit.target: AiiDA是一个计算科学的工作流管理器,它非常注重出处、性能和可扩展性。

trans-unit.source: AiiDA is distributed under the MIT open source license (see LICENSE.txt). For a list of other open source components included in AiiDA, see open_source_licenses.txt.
trans-unit.target: AiiDA是根据MIT开源许可证发行的（请参阅 LICENSE.txt ）。有关AiiDA中包含的其他开源组件的列表，请参见 open_source_licenses.txt 。

trans-unit.source: Giovanni Pizzi, Andrea Cepellotti, Riccardo Sabatini, Nicola Marzari, and Boris Kozinsky, AiiDA: automated interactive infrastructure and database for computational science, Comp. Mat. Sci 111, 218-230 (2016); https://doi.org/10.1016/j.commatsci.2015.09.013; http://www.aiida.net.
trans-unit.target: Giovanni Pizzi，Andrea Cepellotti，Riccardo Sabatini，Nicola Marzari和Boris Kozinsky，AiiDA：计算科学的自动化交互式基础结构和数据库，比较 垫。Sci 111，218-230（2016）; https://doi.org/10.1016/j.commatsci.2015.09.013 ; http://www.aiida.net。

trans-unit.source: The AiiDA team appreciates help from a wide range of different backgrounds. Small improvements of the documentation or minor bug fixes are always welcome.
trans-unit.target: AiiDA团队感谢来自不同背景的帮助。欢迎对文档进行小的改进或小的错误修复。
